mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.rule_id , t1.map_type , t1.map_code from lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.rule_id, t1.map_type, o1.org_code storeCode, o1.org_name storeName, o2.org_code subsectionCode, o2.org_name subsectionName, o3.org_code branchCode, o3.org_name branchName from lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 left join sys_org o1 on t1.map_code = o1.org_code left join sys_org o2 on o2.id = o1.parent_id left join sys_org o3 on o3.id = o2.parent_id where t1.rule_id = #{ruleId} and t1.map_type = 'ORG'

select t1.id, t1.rule_id, t1.map_type, a1.area_code jobCityCode, a1.area_name jobCityName, a2.area_code jobProvinceCode, a2.area_name jobProvinceName from lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 left join sys_area a1 on t1.map_code = a1.area_code left join sys_area a2 on a1.parent_id = a2.area_code where t1.rule_id = #{ruleId} and t1.map_type = 'JOB_ADDR'
mapper.delete: delete from lbt_into_filter_rule_map t1 where t1.rule_id = #{ruleId}
